title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Graduate-Level Electronic Information Resource Utilization Skill Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic research skills and experience using library systems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can search for topic-appropriate electronic resources from academic databases with 90% accuracy
Learners can systematically organize research materials using reference management tools
Learners can evaluate the credibility of digital academic resources with 80%+ accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
